Text:
I bought this after pirating it and falling in love with the show. 

Then, two months ago, I was in a car wreck that broke my right leg and claimed 4 of the 8 discs, and the disc with the last two episodes of the show and the two movies is so dirty and scratched that it doesn't work. I don't know if this is the same torrent I got it from originally, but I just wanted to thank you for putting it up for all to have access to.
Thanks! does it has spanish subs? or it is just in english?
